BBEX3.A.LRD.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Liberia  / USD 1 = LRD ... (middle)
Source: Central Bank of Liberia, Monrovia
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates, from January to November 2000 and from January 2006 calculated on the basis of month-end buying and selling rates.
